Class Cylinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • chapter10.Shape
      • chapter10.ThreeDimensional
        • chapter10.Cylinder

  • public class Cylinder
extends ThreeDimensional

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cylinder()
      Cylinder initializes sides to 1, faces to 3, length to 1 and circle to a new Circle object
      Cylinder(Cylinder cylinder)
      Cylinder creates a copy of the Cylinder object
      Cylinder(double length, Circle circle)
      Cylinder initializes sides to 1, faces to 3, length to the length value passed as an argument and circle to the Circle object passed as an argument

      getLength returns the length of the cylinder

      setCircle sets circle to a copy of Circle object's address passed as an argument
